articles.title: Rankings boost for Afghanistan spinner heading into T20 World Cup - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Rashid Khan returned from injury in style with eight wickets for Afghanistan against Ireland and was duly rewarded on the rankings list for T20I bowlers.
articles.content: Rashid's Afghanistan teammate Naveen-ul-Haq (up two places to 55th) made some ground following his three wickets during the Ireland series, while Irish trio Josh Little (up seven spots to 39th), Mark… [+396 chars]
